title: Sensitivity analysis of planetary boundary layer parameterization on meteorological simulations in the Yangtze river delta region, China
content:
Environ. Sci.: Atmos., 2024, 4,1129-1144
DOI: 10.1039/D4EA00038B, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Dihui Chen, Ansheng Zhu, Ling Huang, Elly Yaluk, Yangjun Wang, Maggie Chel Gee Ooi, Ying Gu, Andy Chan, Li Li
Seasonal variations in meteorological simulations has been evaluated using four PBL schemes, showing that MYNN excels in summer and MYJ performs better in winter, highlighting the importance of scheme selection for accurate simulations.
